protocol_name: UPLC-MS/MS procedures of lipidomics for plasma
protocol_name_html: UPLC-MS/MS procedures of lipidomics for plasma

components.data: Left samples at -20°C for 30 min and thawed at 4°C until no ice was observed in the tubes
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Left samples at -20°C for 30 min and thawed at 4°C until no ice was observed in the tubes

components.data:
For each sample, take 40 μL plasma in a new 96 well using multichannel adjustable spacer
manual pipette, and then add 120 μL precooled isopropanol (IPA) in each well
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
For each sample, take 40 μL plasma in a new 96 well using multichannel adjustable spacer
manual pipette, and then add 120 μL precooled isopropanol (IPA) in each well

components.data: Vortexing the 96 well for 1 min and incubated for 10min in room temperature, the mixture was stored overnight in refrigerator at -20°C to improve protein precipitation
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Vortexing the 96 well for 1 min and incubated for 10min in room temperature, the mixture was stored overnight in refrigerator at -20°C to improve protein precipitation

components.data: Centrifuged the samples for 20 min at 14,000 g
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuged the samples for 20 min at 14,000 g

components.data: Remove the supernatant to a new 96 well, and further diluted with IPA/acetonitrile (ACN)/H2O (2:1:1 v:v:v)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove the supernatant to a new 96 well, and further diluted with IPA/acetonitrile (ACN)/H2O (2:1:1 v:v:v)

components.data: Equal amount of all samples were pooled as QC sample for LC-MS system conditioning and quality control process
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Equal amount of all samples were pooled as QC sample for LC-MS system conditioning and quality control process

components.data: Equilibrate the CSH column with 99% Phase B, set the flow rate at 0.4 mL/min. The initial elution was started from 40% B and was immediately increased by a linear gradient to 43% B for the first 2 min, followed by an increase to 50% B within 0.1 min. Over the next 3.9 min, the gradient was increased to 54% B, and the amount of B was increased to 70% during next 0.1 min. In the final part of the gradient, B was increased to 99% and maintained for 1.9 min. Finally, B was returned to 40% over the next 0.1 min and equilibrated for 1.9 min for the next injection
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Equilibrate the CSH column with 99% Phase B, set the flow rate at 0.4 mL/min. The initial elution was started from 40% B and was immediately increased by a linear gradient to 43% B for the first 2 min, followed by an increase to 50% B within 0.1 min. Over the next 3.9 min, the gradient was increased to 54% B, and the amount of B was increased to 70% during next 0.1 min. In the final part of the gradient, B was increased to 99% and maintained for 1.9 min. Finally, B was returned to 40% over the next 0.1 min and equilibrated for 1.9 min for the next injection

components.data: Using the sodium formate solution for mass calibration and Leucine enkephalin (MW=555.62) was applied as a lock mass for accurate mass measurements
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Using the sodium formate solution for mass calibration and Leucine enkephalin (MW=555.62) was applied as a lock mass for accurate mass measurements

components.data: Both positive and negative modes were performed and operated in Centroid MSE mode with an acquisition time of 0.2 s per scan. Scan range was set at 50–1,800 Da. The capillary was set at 0.25 kV and 2 kV in positive ion mode and negative ion mode, respectively. And sampling cone voltages were set 40 V in two modes. The source temperature was set to 120°C. The desolvation temperature and gas flow were 500°C and 800 L/h
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Both positive and negative modes were performed and operated in Centroid MSE mode with an acquisition time of 0.2 s per scan. Scan range was set at 50–1,800 Da. The capillary was set at 0.25 kV and 2 kV in positive ion mode and negative ion mode, respectively. And sampling cone voltages were set 40 V in two modes. The source temperature was set to 120°C. The desolvation temperature and gas flow were 500°C and 800 L/h

components.data: Run 10 QC samples to evaluate the LC-MS system and the run samples interspersed with QC in positive mode, then run all sample in negative mode
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run 10 QC samples to evaluate the LC-MS system and the run samples interspersed with QC in positive mode, then run all sample in negative mode

components.data: Check the reproducibility of QC samples and then analysis the data by Progenesis QI and metaX
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Check the reproducibility of QC samples and then analysis the data by Progenesis QI and metaX
